nativeLanguage.title: Native Language
nativeLanguage.description:
Select your native language.
When you input text in this language, it will be translated to your learning languages.

learningLanguages.title: Learning Languages
learningLanguages.description: Select the languages you want to learn. These languages will be available in the search and home screens.
learningLanguages.minOneRequired: At least one language must be selected
learningLanguages.confirmDelete: Remove this language from your learning list?

defaultLanguage.title: Default Language
defaultLanguage.description: Select the language to display when the app launches.

developer.title: Developer Tools
developer.resetAppDescription: Reset to initial state (AsyncStorage + auth clear)
developer.resetConfirmMessage: This will clear AsyncStorage and Supabase auth, returning the app to its initial state. The app will restart.
developer.resetCompleteMessage: AsyncStorage and auth cleared. Please restart the app (press 'r' key in terminal).

home.hintText: Long text will automatically switch to translation mode

search.placeholder: Enter a word or phrase to learn...
search.chatPlaceholder: Ask a question about this word...

initialSetup.step1Description: This will be used as the app's display language
initialSetup.step2Description: Multiple selections allowed. You can add or remove later

wordDetail.chatPlaceholder: Ask a question about this word...

bookmarks.title: Bookmarks
bookmarks.deleteBookmarkConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this bookmark?
bookmarks.copiedToClipboard: Question and answer copied to clipboard
bookmarks.noFoldersDescription: Create folders to organize your bookmarks
bookmarks.noBookmarksDescription:
Bookmarked chat responses
will be saved here
bookmarks.noFoldersYetDescription: You can create a new folder from the button below
bookmarks.deleteFolderConfirm:
Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

Bookmarks in this folder will not be deleted.
bookmarks.premiumFolderMessage:
Folder feature is exclusive to Premium plan.

Organize your bookmarks for more efficient learning.

translate.chatPlaceholder: Ask a question about this text...

imageTranslation.ocrParseFailed: Could not read text from image. Please check if the image is clear and contains text.
imageTranslation.ocrProcessingFailed: Text was recognized but an error occurred during processing. Please try again.
imageTranslation.quotaExceeded: API usage limit reached. Please wait a while before retrying.
imageTranslation.contentBlocked: The image content may violate safety policies. Please try a different image.
imageTranslation.fileTooLarge: Image size is too large. Please try a smaller image.
imageTranslation.failed: An error occurred during image translation. Please check if the image is clear and text is visible.

settingsBottomSheet.resetAppDescription: Reset to initial state (AsyncStorage + auth clear)
settingsBottomSheet.resetConfirmMessage: This will clear AsyncStorage and Supabase auth, returning the app to its initial state.
settingsBottomSheet.resetCompleteMessage: AsyncStorage and auth cleared. Please restart the app (press 'r' key in terminal).

textNuance.label: Nuance
textNuance.prompt: Tell me the nuance of this text

grammarCheck.label: Check Grammar
grammarCheck.prompt: Check the grammar and expressions of this text

grammarExplain.label: Explain Grammar
grammarExplain.prompt: Explain the grammar of this text

meaning.label: Meaning
meaning.prompt: Tell me the meaning of this text

wordNuance.label: Nuance
wordNuance.prompt: Tell me the nuance of this word in detail

etymology.label: Etymology
etymology.prompt: Tell me the etymology and origin of this word

synonyms.label: Synonyms
synonyms.prompt: Tell me synonyms for this word

difference.label: Difference?
difference.prompt: Tell me the difference and usage distinction between these words

usageContext.label: Usage Context
usageContext.prompt: Tell me in what situations these words are used

step1.title: Select a Word
step1.description: Long press on a word in the translated text to select it

step2.title: Word Card Displayed
step2.description: You can see the meaning and part of speech. Tap "More Details" to see more information

step3.title: Ask Questions About Words
step3.description: Try tapping the "Etymology" button to learn about the word's origin
